title: Update a Customer's Pricing Agreement
description: A customer has negotiated a new, lower price for a high-volume product. This needs to be updated in their contract.

tasks.description: Find the customer's pricing agreement or contract in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the customer's current contract.

tasks.description: Create an amendment to the contract, updating the price for the specific product.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent drafts an amendment with the new pricing.

tasks.description: Send the contract amendment to the customer for their signature to formalize the new pricing.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends the document for signature.
